attributes.action: Introduce self-defence training in schools to protect our children
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to do this because of how violent the streets have become across the UK. It would give our children the skills, discipline and knowledge of how to avoid dangerous situations and how to be physical in defence if that circumstance ever arose.
attributes.background: We want the government to introduce self-defence classes in our schools as part of the curriculum.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619189

If you'd like this to include the primary curriculum, we could accept a new petition that sets that out clearly.
